src:
Один человек погиб в ДТП с участием рейсового автобуса под Кемеровом

02 Nov 2019, 08:48

Автомобиль Nissan столкнулся с рейсовым автобусом в Кемеровской области. Один человек погиб, еще двое пострадали.
Авария произошла около 2:30 по московскому времени в ночь на субботу, сообщает пресс-служба регионального управления ГИБДД.
По предварительным данным, водитель Nissan выехал на встречную полосу, где врезался в автобус "Нефаз".
Водитель иномарки скончался на месте, травмы получили две пассажирки автобуса.
По факту аварии начато расследование.
text:
Porsche Cayenne wins Coupe version with up to 550 hp
02 Nov 2019, 08:54 by FERNANDO PEDROSO
SAO PAULO, SP (FOLHAPRESS) - Launched in Europe in the first half, the Porsche Cayenne Coupé begins to be sold in Brazil. It arrives in the V6 versions, for $ 459 thousand and Turbo S E-Hybrid, for $ 956 thousand.
Unlike the traditional Cayenne, the Coupe has a lower roof at the rear, the SUV that comes in to rival Audi Q8, BMW X6 and Mercedes GLE Coupe.
The input configuration is equipped with the 3.0 V6 turbo engine, which delivers 340 horsepower and 45.9 kgfm of torque (power). The SUV of more than two tons accelerates from 0 to 100 km / h in 6 seconds and reaches 243 km / h.
The Turbo version has a 550 hp 4.0 V8 78.5 kgfm 4.0 V8 bit and a 136 hp 41 kgfm electric thruster that allows you to drive 40 km with electricity alone - 100 km / h is reached in 3.8 seconds -, while the top speed is 295 km / h. The combined power and torque reach 680 hp and 91.8 kgfm, respectively.
In both cases, the Cayenne Coupé features an eight-speed automatic transmission and all-wheel drive.
Both versions are fitted as standard with the Sport Chrono package, which adds the sport mode driving mode selector and the stopwatch analog clock on the dashboard.
In the most powerful configuration, air suspension (up and down the car) is part of the standard package, but is optional on the V6. The cornering rear steering axle is sold separately for the two engine versions of the model.
